Headline: #95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95, and 112 buses temp. rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and Terminal; WB: 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near 69th. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near 69th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
